org.apache.flink.fs.s3hadoop

类 S3FileSystemFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.fs.s3hadoop.S3FileSystemFactory
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    FileSystemFactory

    public class S3FileSystemFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileSystemFactory
    Simple factory for the S3 file system.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private static java.lang.String[] CONFIG_PREFIXES
      The prefixes that Flink adds to the Hadoop config under 'fs.s3a.'.
      private Configuration flinkConfig
      Flink's configuration object.
      private Configuration hadoopConfig
      Hadoop's configuration for the file systems, lazily initialized.
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG 
      private static java.lang.String[][] MIRRORED_CONFIG_KEYS
      Keys that are replaced (after prefix replacement, to give a more uniform experience across different file system implementations.

        private static final org.slf4j.Logger LOG

        private static final java.lang.String[] CONFIG_PREFIXES
        The prefixes that Flink adds to the Hadoop config under 'fs.s3a.'.

      • MIRRORED_CONFIG_KEYS

        private static final java.lang.String[][] MIRRORED_CONFIG_KEYS

        Flink's configuration object.

      • getScheme

        public java.lang.String getScheme()
        从接口复制的说明: FileSystemFactory
        Gets the scheme of the file system created by this factory.
        指定者:
        getScheme 在接口中 FileSystemFactory

      • configure

        public void configure(Configuration config)
        从接口复制的说明: FileSystemFactory
        Applies the given configuration to this factory. All future file system instantiations via FileSystemFactory.create(URI) should take the configuration into account.
        指定者:
        configure 在接口中 FileSystemFactory
        参数:
        config - The configuration to apply.

      • create

        public FileSystem create(java.net.URI fsUri)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: FileSystemFactory
        Creates a new file system for the given file system URI. The URI describes the type of file system (via its scheme) and optionally the authority (for example the host) of the file system.
        指定者:
        create 在接口中 FileSystemFactory
        参数:
        fsUri - The URI that describes the file system.
        返回:
        A new instance of the specified file system.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the file system could not be instantiated.
